data.text: assess just how relevant it was

data.text: So I'm not against fear.

translation.text: Tôi chỉ là người dũng cảm.

data.text: Now, I'm not saying your girls must be firefighters

data.text: or that they should be paragliders,

data.text: but I am saying that we are raising our girls to be timid, even helpless,

data.text: and it begins when we caution them against physical risk.

data.text: So how do we become brave?

translation.text: Vậy làm thế nào để chúng ta trở nên dũng cảm?

data.text: Well, here's the good news.

translation.text: Vâng, đây là tin tốt.

data.text: and like anything learned,

translation.text: Đầu tiên

data.text: Second, we have to stop cautioning our girls willy-nilly.
